description.summary: The universe of PrimalMyst is structured around Yggdrasil, the World Tree, whose branches and roots connect nine distinct realms of existence, each with its own laws, inhabitants, and relationship to the Mist. The tree itself was shaped by the Fundamental Gods and serves as a conduit for divine influence.
description.detailed: Yggdrasil stands at the center of all existence, a cosmic ash tree whose branches stretch across the heavens and whose roots delve deep into the wells of wisdom and fate. Born from the primordial forces of Pyrion's fire, Glacius's preservation, and Voltharion's connecting spark, the World Tree serves as both structure and conduit for all cosmic forces. The Nine Realms exist as distinct layers of reality, connected by the World Tree's vast structure, each resonating with different aspects of the divine hierarchy. Each realm has its own relationship with the Mist that flows between them, creating unique conditions for life, magic, and divine influence. The realms are not simply different planets or dimensions, but fundamental aspects of existence itself - representing different ways that consciousness, matter, mystical force, and divine power can interact. Travel between realms is possible for those who understand the pathways through Yggdrasil, though such journeys are never without risk, as the Mist can lead travelers astray or expose them to raw divine influence they are not prepared to handle.
description.divine_connection: The World Tree channels power from the Fundamental Gods through its very structure - fire flows through its burning heartwood, ice crystallizes in its eternal bark, and lightning crackles along its branches connecting the realms. The Primal Gods use these divine highways to extend their influence, while the Veiled Ones exist in the spaces between the tree's growth cycles.
description.implications: Understanding the Nine Realms reveals that what mortals call 'reality' is only one layer of a vast, interconnected cosmic structure shaped by divine forces that predate creation itself. Events in one realm can influence all others through the World Tree's connections, and the cyclical nature of leagues and time reflects both the greater cycles of the cosmos and the mysterious workings of entities like Myrielle.

principles.name: Realm Resonance
principles.description: Each realm vibrates at a unique frequency, affecting how the Mist flows and what forms of existence are possible
principles.limitations: Beings from one realm may find it difficult to exist comfortably in realms with very different resonance

principles.name: Tree Pathways
principles.description: Specific routes through Yggdrasil's structure that allow travel between realms
principles.limitations: Pathways can shift, close, or become dangerous based on cosmic conditions and realm relationships

principles.name: Mist Gradients
principles.description: The concentration and nature of the Mist varies between realms, affecting mystical abilities and perception
principles.limitations: Some mystical techniques only work in specific realms or require adaptation for different Mist densities

principles.name: Cosmic Balance
principles.description: The Nine Realms exist in a delicate equilibrium; major changes in one affect all others
principles.limitations: Actions that significantly alter one realm can have unpredictable consequences across the World Tree

interactions.result: The World Tree's structure directs how the Mist moves between realms, creating currents and eddies
Beings' awareness and spiritual development affects which realms they can perceive or access
The interaction of the Nine Realms creates the greater cycles that govern leagues and cosmic events
Events across all Nine Realms contribute to the great patterns that seers and oracles read

realms.name: Asgard
realms.description: Realm of the Aesir gods and divine order, where divine will shapes reality directly
realms.mist_nature: Pure and radiant, carrying divine inspiration and cosmic law

realms.name: Midgard
realms.description: The Middle Realm, home to humans and the primary stage for mortal affairs
realms.mist_nature: Balanced and changeable, reflecting mortal hopes, fears, and dreams

realms.name: Alfheim
realms.description: Realm of the Light Elves, where beauty and artistic perfection hold sway
realms.mist_nature: Luminous and inspiring, enhancing creativity and aesthetic perception

realms.name: Vanaheim
realms.description: Realm of the Vanir gods and natural wisdom, where ancient knowledge flows freely
realms.mist_nature: Deep and knowing, carrying the wisdom of ages and natural cycles

realms.name: Jotunheim
realms.description: Realm of the Giants, where primal chaos and raw power challenge divine order
realms.mist_nature: Wild and unpredictable, carrying the essence of change and challenge

realms.name: Svartalfheim
realms.description: Realm of the Dark Elves and Dwarves, master craftsmen who shape reality through skill
realms.mist_nature: Dense and purposeful, carrying the essence of creation and transformation

realms.name: Helheim
realms.description: Realm of the dead and the honored fallen, where endings become beginnings
realms.mist_nature: Solemn and memorial, carrying the memories and wisdom of the departed

realms.name: Muspelheim
realms.description: Realm of fire and renewal, where destruction and creation dance in eternal cycle
realms.mist_nature: Hot and transformative, carrying the power of renewal through destruction

realms.name: Niflheim
realms.description: The primordial realm of mist and ice, source of all mystical essence and memory
realms.mist_nature: The original Mist in its purest form, containing all possibilities and memories

scholarly_notes.note: From my post at the Rainbow Bridge, I can see how the Mist flows between all Nine Realms like cosmic rivers. Each realm colors the Mist differently, and these colors tell the story of existence itself.

scholarly_notes.scholar: Master Erik of the Northern Academy
scholarly_notes.note: The mathematics of the Nine Realms suggest they are not arbitrary divisions, but represent fundamental aspects of consciousness and reality. Each realm embodies a different way of being.

mysteries.question: Are there realms beyond the traditional Nine, hidden in the deeper roots or higher branches of Yggdrasil?

theories.theory: The Tenth Realm exists at the very heart of Yggdrasil, accessible only to those who understand all Nine
theories.evidence: Ancient texts speak of a 'hidden kingdom' that some heroes have glimpsed but never reached
theories.proponent: Master Erik of the Northern Academy

theories.theory: Each of the Nine Realms contains sub-realms, creating infinite layers of existence
theories.evidence: Explorers report finding 'realms within realms' when traveling deep into any single world

clues: Some mystical artifacts show symbols for more than nine realms
Certain prophecies mention 'the realm that is all realms'
The Aurora Borealis sometimes shows colors that don't correspond to any known realm

contradictions.nature_of_conflict: Some cultures describe a completely different cosmic structure with seven or twelve realms
contradictions.resolution_attempts: Scholars theorize that different regions of Yggdrasil may show different numbers of accessible realms based on local conditions

fundamental_god_presence.pyrion_manifestation: The burning heartwood of Yggdrasil, eternal flames that never consume the tree itself, providing the energy that maintains all life across the realms
fundamental_god_presence.glacius_manifestation: The crystalline bark that preserves the tree's memories and maintains the stability of realm-to-realm connections
fundamental_god_presence.voltharion_manifestation: The electrical current that flows through every branch and root, enabling instantaneous communication and travel between distant realms

primal_god_channels.nyxtharion_influence: Flows strongest through branches that lead to chaotic realms, bringing beneficial change and preventing cosmic stagnation
primal_god_channels.luminareth_influence: Provides protective light through branches leading to ordered realms, maintaining safe harbors and healing sanctuaries
primal_god_channels.drakmorth_influence: Strengthens the physical structure of the tree itself, ensuring its branches can bear the weight of entire realms and protecting travelers from physical harm

veiled_one_mysteries.myrielle_presence: Exists in the spaces between the tree's growth cycles, facilitating the cosmic renewal that creates new branches and allows old ones to rest
veiled_one_mysteries.cycle_mechanics: When cosmic conditions shift, Myrielle helps guide souls to appropriate realms and assists in manifesting new physical forms suited to changing divine influences
